title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embeddings, model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package exposing Ollama models as LLM, chat, and embedding components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI); chat history, model manager, RAG, multi-user.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent API, streaming, embeddings, model operations.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, delete, copy, list models.

title: ollama-cli-crystal
summary: Crystal-lang CLI for chatting with Ollama models; colored output, REPL mode.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as inline Copilot suggestions.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-models
summary: Curated collection of Modelfile recipes for community-tuned Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama variants.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team; use local models for generative QA and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama chat/generate inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/sync bindings to Ollama’s REST API; tokio/hyper based.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: Drop-in FastAPI proxy that adds OpenAI-style endpoints and token counting to Ollama.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered apps.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform) construct to deploy Ollama on AWS ECS with GPU accelerators.

title: ollama-rag-qa
summary: Example repo showing RAG question-answering with Ollama, ChromaDB and LangChain.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot bringing local Ollama models to any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat UI template that connects to local Ollama; includes model selector and token stats.
